Class Piece

    • Piece.Piece

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String name,
             Block block,
             java.lang.String color,
             Player player)
        Specifies the name, block, color and player of the Piece.
        Parameters:
        name - Name used to identify a piece
        block - The block the piece is initially placed on
        color - Color of the block the piece is placed on
        player - The player who owns the piece.

                             boolean check,
                             java.lang.String move)
        The block a piece is being moved to
        Parameters:
        moveTo - The block the piece is being moved to
        check - If the move is being executed or only checked whether it results in a check.
        move - Used for pawn promotion
